Sentencas: Anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have been developed at Tokyo Gas.
Titulo: Development of envelope-type solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Recently, to achieve a tight gas seals and sufficient electrical contacts between each cell, a new method for stacking the cells has been evolved.
Titulo: Development of envelope-type solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The former system was assembled by stacking planar cells and rigid planar interconnectors alternately.
Titulo: Development of envelope-type solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: This study reports a new system, in which constituent units with an envelope configuration are piled vertically.
Titulo: Development of envelope-type solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Each cell is wrapped in a thin electrically conductive alloy and connected to the next cell through a flexible metal interconnector.
Titulo: Development of envelope-type solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Thus, the assembly is called an envelope-type SOFC stack.
Titulo: Development of envelope-type solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: By using a thin alloy foil and a flexible metal interconnector, tight gas seals and sufficient electrical contact between each cell are achieved.
Titulo: Development of envelope-type solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Tests are conducted on 7- and 20-cell stacks and an improvement in performance is obtained.
Titulo: Development of envelope-type solid oxide fuel cell stacks
